attributes.action: some  shops should sell cheaper stuff because everything went up and now it should go down especially when there is a credit crunch because everything has went up price and if it stays the same it england would be poor again and 1p will be alot
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
